name: FlashDevelop ActionScript 3 Project File
summary: Learn about .AS3PROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: ActionScript 3 projects can be created by selecting Project â†’ New Project in the software. The AS3PROJ file and the supporting project directories and files are saved to the directory that you specify in the dialog window that appears. The program manages all information in the AS3PROJ file, so developers do not have to edit it manually.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
